# indefinite

**Type Property**

A value that represents an indefinite time.

## Declaration

```swift
static let indefinite: CMTime
```

## Discussion

Don’t test a time against this constant using (`time ==` [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/indefinite]) because there are many that are also indefinite. Use [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTIME_IS_INDEFINITE(_:)] instead.

## Constants

- **zero**: A value that represents time zero.
- **invalid**: A value that represents an invalid time.
- **negativeInfinity**: A value that represents negative infinity.
- **positiveInfinity**: A value that represents positive infinity.
